title: Rihanna holds friend's newborn baby calling herself 'Aunty Oh NaNa' in adorable snap from hospital
text:
Rihanna held her friend's newborn baby in a shot she shared on her Instagram page Tuesday evening.

The 31-year-old vocalist added the caption 'Aunty Oh NaNa x JJ,' to a post in which she cuddled the tot named Justin Joshua, who's the son of her friend Jennifer Rosales and her husband, Aaron Davis.

The Umbrella singer's hair was braided and she wore a black sweater at the medical facility the shots were snapped at.

Awww! Rihanna, 31, held her friend's newborn baby son in a shot she shared on her Instagram page Tuesday evening

The You Da One singer posted a separate shot that was snapped from behind, saying she was happy to be present on the joyous day.

'I’m so grateful that I was here for your first day on the playground kid!!' Rihanna said. 'Aunty loves you so much already. CONGRATULATIONS to the Davis fam!'

She called Rosales 'a beast for making this look easy,' Davis 'a super dope dad,' and had conciliatory words for the couple's older tot Aaron as he became a big brother.

'I know you not gonna like sharing yo mama,' she said, 'but you get all the new toys, lil bro only gets your old ones so you good! Here’s to baby #JustusJoshuaDavis.'

Present: The You Da One singer posted a separate shot that was snapped from behind, saying she was happy to be there on the joyous day

Beaming: Rihanna, who's currently dating Saudi Arabian businessman Hassan Jameel, 31, has been at the center of baby murmurs as of late. She was snapped in LA last week

Confidantes: Rosales, 36, has worked for the Barbados-born beauty for more than a decade in multiple capacities

Rosales, 36, has worked for the Barbados-born beauty for more than a decade in multiple capacities. She was once her personal assistant and is currently working for the star's Fenty Corporation as a project director.

Rihanna, who's currently dating Saudi Arabian businessman Hassan Jameel, 31, has been at the center of baby murmurs as of late.

Earlier this month, she told Vogue that 'without a doubt,' she hopes to have children one day. In a June chat with actress Sarah Paulson for Interview Magazine, the Live Your Life songstress said she hopes to have kids 'more than anything in life.'
description: The Umbrella singer's hair was braided and she wore a black sweater at a medical facility the shots were snapped at.
